Approximately 1-2 babies in 
every 1,000 are born with a 
permanent hearing loss in one 
or both ears. (This increases to 
approximately 1 in every 100, 
for babies who spend more 
than 48 continuous hours in a 
neonatal intensive care unit or 
special care baby unit.)
Consent to participate must
